game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has broken, fragments of different eras have collided, creating a realm of temporal chaos. You are the last chronomancer, tasked with collecting and restoring the shattered remnants of time.
game.beginning: The game begins in the ruins of a once-great city, where you stumble upon an ancient artifact that sets your journey ablaze. The world is shrouded in eternal twilight, as if time itself has lost its meaning.
game.ending: After traversing realms both past and future, you arrive at the heart of the temporal maelstrom – a realm known only as Eternity's Eye. There, you engage in an epic battle with the master of chaos, resetting the timeline to its original path.
